Package stage.utils

package stage.utils
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    stage
     
    stage.components
     
    stage.gui
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddAllLabels
    This class adds all the labels to the HUD of the stage
    CenterOnDefaultScreen
    This utility finds out which monitor is the primary and takes its size.
    FindDirectory
    This utility finds the file given in the constructor, searching from the directory in which the user is at the moment of the request.
    MainFontLoader
    This utility has the purpose of loading the "Retro Gaming.ttf" font and choosing a size for it.
    MainImagesLoader
    This utility has the purpose of loading the desired image.
    SecondaryFontLoader
    If the MainFontLoader fails, this class loads a Font file and returns it as a Font Object.
    SecondaryImagesLoader
    If the MainImageLoader fails, this class loads a BufferedImage.
